name: Grapple Ball (IedSoftworks)
description:
In this mini-game, you're goal is to hit all balls into the circular goal. But at the same time the balls are used to keep you up.

Please keep in mind, its my very first (Unity) game, so please don't be too harsh. It was more a learning expierence, than a real game.
And I never say no to constructive critic.

Controls:
Left Click - Grappling Hook
WASD - Apply force to a direction while grappling.
Right Click - Shoot (hold to charge)
